sentences.sentence: I had arthroscopic surgery and missed 35 games.
sentences.translation: 我接受了内窥镜手术并因此错过35场比赛。

sentences.sentence: Some patients have a strong desire to remain awake to view arthroscopic surgery as it is being performed.
sentences.translation: 有一些关节镜手术病人强烈希望能保持清醒观看手书操作。

sentences.sentence: In the virtual knee arthroscopic surgery, a real-time large deformation of the knee joint model is required.
sentences.translation: 在虚拟膝关节手术中，需要对膝关节进行大范围形变的实时模拟。
